extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  Level 2 or above or 6.0 units at the 100 level in RELS

basic.description: Moral and religious norms of ethical judgment in bio-medicine; specific issues will be chosen such as population control, abortion, genetic control, experimentation, consent behaviour control, death and euthanasia.
basic.subject: RELS
basic.title: Religion and Bioethics
